Reviews.Title: Serves its purpose
Reviews.Author: eternitybound
Reviews.Content: I needed a basic texting phone for the hubby, who's been text resistant until now.  It is old fashioned text messaging at its most basic, but it does that just fine.  Battery life is pretty poor--only lasts 3 days on standby!  Everything else works like a basic cheap phone.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
2.0MP camera, Color display, Hands-free speakerphone
Bluetooth technology v2.1 with A2DP, Up to 4 hours talk time and 18 days standby
MP3 playback, Multimedia, text and video messaging, Customizable MP3 ringtones
Operates on dual-band UMTS/HSDPA and quad-band EDGE networks
ProductInfo.Name: Alcatel One Touch 871a OT-871a Unlocked GSM QWERTY Cell Phone - White (with Blue Border)
